hotels.title: Genoa Elegance near Portofino with Daily Breakfast, Welcome Cocktails & Spa Access
hotels.description: Tucked away in the leafy heart of Genoa, you'll find a five-star Meliá collection hotel dripping with Italian elegance. Moments from the city’s historic centre and a stone’s throw from the sparkling Italian Riviera, this refined retreat is your gateway to Cinque Terre’s pastel-hued villages and the glamour of Portofino. From the moment you step into the sleek, art-adorned lobby, you’ll feel the city’s rich maritime heritage woven into every detail. Unwind in spacious, designer-styled rooms before indulging in Ligurian cuisine at Blue Lounge & Restaurant. The expansive YHI Wellness spa, complete with a heated indoor pool and Turkish bath, offers the perfect reset after a day of city exploration.
